title: Process a Tenant's Notice to Vacate
description: A month-to-month tenant has submitted their 30-day notice to vacate. The agent must process it.

tasks.description: Receive the tenant's written notice to vacate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the notice and the date it was received.

tasks.description: Calculate the official move-out date based on the notice period and update the tenant's lease record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the correct lease end date and updates the system.

tasks.description: Send a confirmation to the tenant acknowledging their notice and providing them with move-out procedures and a cleaning checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a comprehensive email with all necessary move-out information.
